metadata.title: CVE-2018-20455 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In radare2 prior to 3.1.1, the parseOperand function insidelibr/asm/p/asm_x86_nz.c may allow attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash via a stack-based buffer overflow) by crafting an inputfile, a related issue to CVE-2018-20456.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
